rows.label: bf11620100_0060
rows.name: Hey, Shin...

rows.label: bf11620100_0070
rows.name: You don't need that anymore, right?

rows.label: bf11620100_0080
rows.name: Yeah. Now that you're a knight of Iira.

rows.label: bf11620100_0090
rows.name:
There will be no one left to blame me
for awakening from a stolen Core.

rows.label: bf11620100_0100
rows.name: What should you do with it...?

rows.label: bf11620100_0110
rows.name: Nothing. I'll keep wearing it.

rows.label: bf11620100_0120
rows.name: Because you made it for me, Laura.

rows.label: bf11620100_0130
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: bf11620100_0140
rows.name: Someday...

rows.label: bf11620100_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]?

rows.label: bf11620100_0160
rows.name:
Someday I'll die,
and you'll go back to your Core.

rows.label: bf11620100_0170
rows.name: Even if you forget everything,

rows.label: bf11620100_0172
rows.name: I'd be happy if you at least kept the mask...

rows.label: bf11620100_0180
rows.name: Laura...

rows.label: bf11620100_0190
rows.name:
I'm talking about someday,
way in the future. Don't worry.

rows.label: bf11620100_0200
rows.name: I hope and pray that this diary finds its way to "you."

rows.label: bf11620100_0210
rows.name:
Trusting in that, I will leave behind
a way for me to remain myself, in the end.

rows.label: bf11620100_0220
rows.name:
I will leave a way to engrave the bond
with my partner into my very being.

rows.label: bf11620100_0230
rows.name: The method is[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf11620100_0240
rows.name: The method is

rows.label: bf11620100_0250
rows.name:
to make the heart of your beloved
a part of your own flesh and blood.

rows.label: bf11620100_0260
rows.name: By doing that, their bond will become eternal.

rows.label: bf11620100_0270
rows.name: But is that really the best way?

rows.label: bf11620100_0280
rows.name: Even if the memories can be preserved,

rows.label: bf11620100_0290
rows.name: will my heart be satisfied by that?

rows.label: bf11620100_0300
rows.name: Will her heart truly be there?

rows.label: bf11620100_0310
rows.name: I wonder...
